ygData.subject: About Roleplaying
ygData.msgSnippet: Every one says powergaming and roleplaying as it where two different things. I thought Power gaming was a sort of Role Playing as you play a role even when you
ygData.messageBody:
Every one says powergaming and roleplaying as it where two different things.
I thought Power gaming was a sort of Role Playing as you play a role even
when you are powergaming. When I play i take blues and black to get good xp.
I dont go around killing green stuff to get the time going so I after youre
fashion call a roleplaying. I lvl about 1lvl a week. And are happy with
that. And of course I get the best weapon i can get at my lvl.

So can anyone, if I am wrong in my understanding of powergaming, explain me
what is powergaming and why that is not a way of Roleplaying as i think it
is. And what is wrong with it. If people has much freetime and use it to
play, it should not be called powergameing. As I have seen it been called in
earlier posts.

Please dont flame me about this as I dont know. And just seeks understanding

Karl Hatteland
